column4: what do i need to get a webcam working besides the kernel driver being loaded?
what program are you using to view the webcam? what happens when you do so/
hmm, unable to open '/dev/video0': Invalid argument
https://help.ubuntu.com/community/Spca5xx . and all it took was google...
actually, should work out of the box on 6.06 and higher...
but if there is a /dev/video0 device, it suggests that the driver is working. check the output of 'dmesg'
